Module com.vnd.mco2restructure
Package com.vnd.mco2restructure.model.items

Class IndependentItem

java.lang.Object
com.vnd.mco2restructure.model.items.Item
com.vnd.mco2restructure.model.items.NonCustomizableItem
com.vnd.mco2restructure.model.items.IndependentItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class IndependentItem extends NonCustomizableItem
The IndependentItem class represents an independent item in the vending machine. It extends the NonCustomizableItem class.

  • Constructor Details

    • IndependentItem

      public IndependentItem(String name, int calories, int id, int price, String imageFile)
      Constructs an IndependentItem object with the specified name, calories, id, price, and image file.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the independent item.
      calories - The number of calories in the independent item.
      id - The unique identifier of the independent item.
      price - The price of the independent item.
      imageFile - The file path of the image for the independent item.

  • Method Details

    • getPrice

      public int getPrice()
      Gets the price of the independent item. The price is fetched from the corresponding IndependentItemEnum based on the item's ID.
      Specified by:
      getPrice in class Item
      Returns:
      The price of the independent item.
